title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Build 200201151. When searching for references to a field, the first match is not selected in an external jar.
OB: When double-clicking on a search result, the first match is not automatically selected.
EB: When double-clicking on a search result, the first match should be automatically selected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Make sure you have JDK1.3.1 as the default JRE (and that you have source code for rt.jar).
2. Open java.io.File.
3. Select the field 'tmpFir' from the code.
4. Perform a search for references to this field.
